title: Best Delinquent Wife’s Order: Rise Again, Hubby - Novel Updates
author: Double Happiness Peach   桃喜喜
description:
“Zuo Hancheng! You animal—you’ve even slept with a high schooler!” 

Upon looking at her in front of him, the man directly knelt and pressed his blushing nineteen-year-old wife upon his desk— 

Afterward, she regretted what she did and escaped from the CEO's office while covering her face! 

When she was left heartbroken a month ago, she went to a bar and bumped into a mysterious man. Little did she realize that he was the most untouchable person in City A—Zuo Hancheng.>
